EmailTemplate.name: Honda Layout - Mispack Dealer: Part no: - EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Mispack Dealer: Part no:
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Mispack Dealer: Part no:
Thank you for your call to report this mispack. Please reply to this email with the information requested below.
Part number: VIN (S/N) this is for: How many NG (no good) did you receive: Please list the JD/lot number for each NG received:
Are you able to identify the part you received? Are there any label/markings/stampings on the original part? Are there any label/markings/stampings on the NG part? Pictures needed (pictures must be focused) Please use a caliper for small parts or small measurements, show in the picture where the measure is taken. a picture of the Honda label as well as any other label a picture of all stamping on part (on both the OE and the NG) a picture of the OE and the NG part side by side, same angle same distance so we can see the difference a picture showing problem area; with a ruler, show measurements on both OE and NG parts a picture showing entire part
We ask that you do not submit a credit request nor re-order the part until our investigation is completed. In your own words, please describe why this part isn't good: Note: if the problem is a difference in size, please provide measurements of the original part as well as those of the received part. In the pictures, please indicate where these measurements were taken.
************************************************************************
Privacy Policy | Terms & Conditions | Contact Us
This is a system email account, and unfortunately, replies to this email cannot be acknowledged. If you have any questions or comments please follow this Contact Us link: http://www.honda.ca/contact_us
At Honda, we hold your personal information in strictest confidence, in accordance with federal and provincial guidelines. For further details on Honda's Customer Privacy Policy, please visit our Privacy Policy (http://www.honda.ca/privacy).

All information contained herein applies to Canadian products only.
